It’s about whether Arizona seniors are going to have a senator who will protect the retirement they’ve worked their whole lives to earn — or a senator who said he wants to let Wall Street gamble away their Social Security.

It’s about whether Arizona women are going to have a senator who will fight for their right to make their own choices, including the right to an abortion — or a senator who wants to take their rights away and make those decisions for them.

It’s about whether Arizona families are going to have a senator who stands up to price-gouging corporations — or a senator who wants to give big businesses and the wealthy more tax breaks that should be going to working families instead.
